name: mywaterway
description: A tool to learn about your water resources.
author: USEPA (https://www.epa.gov)

scripts.setup: echo "Installing project dependencies..." && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && echo "Installing client dependencies..." && cd client && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && echo "Installing server dependencies..." && cd .. && cd server && npm ci
scripts.client_coverage: npx rimraf .nyc_output/out.json && npx rimraf coverage && concurrently -s first -kc "blue.dim,green.dim,yellow.dim" -n server,client,cypress "npm:server_coverage" "npm:client" "cypress run --browser electron"
scripts.coverage_spec_ex: npx rimraf .nyc_output/out.json && concurrently -s first -kc "blue.dim,green.dim,yellow.dim" -n server,client,cypress "npm:server_coverage" "npm:client" "cypress run --browser electron --spec 'cypress/e2e/educational-materials.cy.ts'" && echo REMINDER Manually delete CYPRESS-TEST
scripts.coverage: cd server && npm run test && cd .. && npm run client_coverage && node combine_coverage_reports.js && echo REMINDER Manually delete CYPRESS-TEST
